title: Can't Gift "Not friends long enough"
body: I'm trying to gift a champion, and I've read that you need to be friends 24 hours, or for 2 weeks, but it's probably been 1/2 months now, and I can't gift still, so I was wondering what the go is here?

replies.body:
Hey,

Thanks for letting us know.  We're taking a look now to see what is wrong.... Stand by!

Cheers
Mindstar
